push.name: Push Day
push.warmup: Foam roll 2min → arm circles, band pull-aparts ×15, push-ups ×10 → 2 warm-up sets bench (bar, then 50%)

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Full ROM, pause at chest

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Standing, strict press

exercises.name: Incline DB Press
exercises.notes: Bench at ~30° incline. Weight is per hand.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.notes: Bodyweight. Lean forward for chest. Add weight when >12 easy.

exercises.name: DB Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Weight per hand. Superset with tricep extension.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension (EZ Bar)
exercises.notes: Superset with lateral raise.

exercises.name: Push-ups (Burnout)
exercises.notes: AMRAP. Slow eccentric.

pull.name: Pull Day
pull.warmup: Foam roll 2min → arm circles, band pull-aparts ×15, dead hang 30s → 1 warm-up set pull-ups, 1 warm-up set rows

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.notes: AMRAP each set (target 6-10). BW. Band assist if <6, add weight if >10.

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.notes: Overhand grip, torso ~45°

exercises.name: Single-Arm DB Row
exercises.notes: Per arm. Knee on bench, full stretch at bottom.

exercises.name: EZ Bar Curl
exercises.notes: Strict form, no swinging

exercises.name: Face Pull (Band)
exercises.notes: Medium band. External rotation at top. Superset with hammer curl.

exercises.name: DB Hammer Curl
exercises.notes: Per hand. Superset with face pull.

exercises.name: Dead Hang
exercises.notes: Max hold each set. Target 45-60 sec. Log time in reps field (seconds).

legs.name: Leg Day
legs.warmup: Foam roll 2min → hip circles, leg swings ×10 each, BW squats ×15, glute bridges ×15 → 2 warm-up sets squat (bar, then 50%)

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.notes: Below parallel. Use the rack.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Barbell. Hinge pattern. Slow eccentric.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat (DB)
exercises.notes: Per leg. Weight per hand. Rear foot on bench.

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exercises.notes: Back against bench, full hip extension at top.

exercises.name: DB Walking Lunge
exercises.notes: Per leg. Weight per hand. Superset with hanging leg raise.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Control the swing. Superset with walking lunge.

exercises.name: Calf Raise (Barbell)
exercises.notes: Barbell on back. Pause 2sec at top. Full ROM.
